info.title: Mobile Applications Developer
info.bio:
With a rich mix of software, business, design, and a sharp eye for details, I find it my ultimate joy to create elegant, meaningful, and intuitive software solutions with the end-user in mind.

I have +7 years of software development experience, making mobile and web applications. I started building native iOS apps back then, when it was iOS 6 and Xcode 4, and have been doing that onto the latest SDK now, in the middle I did some PHP (Laravel framework), and Appcelerator Titanium (Mobile Cross-platform), and Flutter projects.

I’m a computers engineering graduate with a Very-Good BSc. degree (ranked class 3rd). I also just got my MBA degree with a GPA of 3.9.

I have always invested time and effort in core skills for building software and this approach has seen me pick up new skills quickly and succeed on challenging projects many times.

Over the last two years, I have started diversifying my technical skills. I did some web projects and also some Flutter projects, this has exposed me to many other tools that made me enjoy the development process even more. I enjoy all the challenges this industry offers; delivery, leadership, technology, customer satisfaction, innovation, and ongoing learning.

This is a portfolio of several mobile and web apps I have worked on. My experience goes much further than that with experience as a freelance software developer, managing end-to-end project analysis, launching, and maintenance.

projects.title: Koinz
projects.description: Koinz is the intelligent growth engine for restaurants. it is a game-like loyalty platform with a uniquely engaging experience that helps increase customer satisfaction as well as keep them engaged and connected to the brand.
projects.Challenges: Along with my friend Mina Maged, we managed to get Koinz up and running with a world-class UI quality and an outstanding user experience.

projects.title: Steyoyoke
projects.description: Christian Legno a world-class music composer, it was an honor helping him rebuild his app. The app is a music and podcast platform for Legno and his colleges.
projects.Challenges: Having a large global audience with a legacy app already in-use, it was quite a challenge to provide the app in a stable, robust yet neat form. Plus the music player transition wasn't easy too.

projects.title: Earworms
projects.description: The leading language-education platform in Europe, with a huge libary of cross-languages musical training.
projects.Challenges: Despite the fact that is a cross-platform app, Earworms provides a unique language training experience, I do love this app!

projects.title: 5forLife® Challenge
projects.description: Gamified 25 days challenge to build healthy habits

projects.title: ZAD
projects.description: One of the leading grocery shoping apps in Saudi Arabia.
projects.Challenges: Nothing special, a normal grocery app with a large user base.

feedBack.title: Christian Legno, Italy.
feedBack.text: professional, skilled and very nice guy.

feedBack.title: Christian Victor, Germany.
feedBack.text: Very successfull work! Mohamed is not only a very skilled programmer but has an essential grasp of what has to be done and adds a lot of creative input to our projects.

feedBack.title: Mohamed Fathy, Dott Qatar.
feedBack.text: Mohamed delivered good work on this iOS app and I enjoyed working with him. His communication was top-notch, he met all deadlines, and his skills were reasonably strong. At one point I asked for an additional milestone and he was very forthcoming that the additional work was outside his area of expertise. He helped me find additional freelancers to support the work. I enjoyed working with Mohamed and will likely have additional jobs for him in the future.
